summary: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.
cast: Ginnifer Goodwin|Kate Hudson|Colin Egglesfield|John Krasinski|Steve Howey|Ashley Williams|Geoff Pierson|Jill Eikenberry|Jonathan Epstein|Leia Thompson|Sarah Baldwin|Mark La Mura|Lindsay Ryan|Kirsten Day|Christopher Peuler|Herb Lieberz|Jimmy Palumbo|Mary O'Rourke|Marina Hirschfeld|Tim Dunavant|Noel Davis Poyner|P.T. Walkley|Scott Hollingsworth|Nicky Kulund|Jared Schlemovitz|Sandy Dell|Anne Bergstedt|Devon Diep|Emily Giffin|Gina Hernandez|Rosemary Howard|Brandon Hunter|Alexis Johnson|Peyton List|Brian McCormack|Kirkryan McFarland|ViDonna Michaels|Jeffrey Mowery|Desira Pesta|Melissa Goodwin Shepherd|Hannah Templeton-Cox|Daniel Wolfe
title: Algo prestado
